content: We have two new additions to the mathlib maintainers list: @Gabriel Ebner and @Yury G. Kudryashov . Welcome, guys!
And a reminder to everyone: even though maintainers have merge rights, we're very happy to see PR reviews from any and everybody.
This is great news. Thanks to both Gabriel and Yury.
Congrats, and thanks to all of the maintainers for your hard work.

The mathlib maintainer team is very pleased to welcome three new members: @Riccardo Brasca, @Frédéric Dupuis and @Kyle Miller! If you're loosing track of the composition of this team, you can find it here.

Rob Lewis said:

And a reminder to everyone: even though maintainers have merge rights, we're very happy to see PR reviews from any and everybody.
